title: Long-D
lyrics:
Neolan dal-e gakkawo jilyeomyeon
I haengseong-eul tteonaya hana bwa
Neolan dal-e gakkawo jilyeomyeon
Nae modeungeol beolyeoya hana bwa
Neon meolli meolli issneunde

Nae mam-eul salo jab-eun chae

Kkeul-eodang-gyeossdaga mil-eonae

Nal ppajyeodeulge mandeune



Naneun neoleul boneunde

Gat-i usgo issneunde

Ne mam-eun gyeot-e eobsneun geolkka

Wae geuleon neukkim-i deuneun geolkka



Darling you’re so far away

When I run to you, run away

Eotteohge haeyaman

Will you love me like I do

Gat-i iss-eodo

Your Heart is Million miles apart



Neolan byeol-eul nae gyeot-e dulyeomyeon

Nae gieog-eul jiwoya hana bwa

Neolan byeol-eul nae gyeot-e dulyeomyeon

Nae modeungeol biwoya hana bwa



Neon meolli meolli issneunde

Nae mam-eul salo jab-eun chae

Kkeul-eodang-gyeossdaga mil-eonae

Nal ppajyeodeulge mandeune

Naneun neoleul boneunde

Gat-i usgo issneunde

Ne mam-eun gyeot-e eobsneun geolkka

Wae geuleon neukkim-i deuneun geolkka



Darling you’re so far away

When I run to you, run away

Eotteohge haeyaman

Will you love me like I do

Gat-i iss-eodo

Your Heart is Million miles apart



Darling you’re so far away

When I run to you, you run away

Eotteohge haeyaman

Will you love me like I do

Gat-i iss-eodo

Our Love is Million miles apart
